functionDecorators.name: recoverTokens
functionDecorators.description: Recover any residual ERC20 token/ETH to the multisig.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: ERC20 token address that is sent to this contract. Address 0 for ETH.

parameterDecorators.name: from
parameterDecorators.description: address token holder address. Should be zddress zero for token mintin.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 amount of tokens to transfer.

parameterDecorators.name: userData
parameterDecorators.description: bytes extra information provided by the token holder (if any).

parameterDecorators.name: operatorData
parameterDecorators.description: bytes extra information provided by the operator (if any).
